# stdout-v1alpha1_standard_out (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) name of the StandardOut
- `namespace` (String) the namespace scope in which to operate

### Optional

- `hash` (String) resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
- `spec` (Attributes) StandardOutSpec defines the desired state of StandardOut. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--spec))

### Read-Only

- `alarms` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms))
- `api_version` (String)
- `deviations` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--deviations))
- `kind` (String)
- `metadata` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))
- `status` (Attributes) StandardOutStatus defines the observed state of StandardOut. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--status))

<a id="nestedatt--spec"></a>
### Nested Schema for `spec`

Optional:

- `exports` (Attributes List) Exports is the list of EDB paths to be exported and mode for each. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--spec--exports))

<a id="nestedatt--spec--exports"></a>
### Nested Schema for `spec.exports`

Optional:

- `fields` (List of String) List of fields to be exported from the EDB table, defaults to all if omitted.
- `mode` (String) Export Mode
- `path` (String) The EDB path to the table being exported, formatted as '.namespace.node.srl.interface'.
StandardOut exports are restricted to its own namespace.
ClusterStandardOut exports can export data from multiple namespaces as well as cluster tables.
- `period` (String) Export period, in the format 10s , 1m30s , 1h30m etc.
- `where` (String) A where clause to use for the query, e.g. oper-state = down . Enclosing parentheses can be omitted.

- `warning` (Number)
